original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2171)@</color>從地面召喚7叢橫列的刺石叢，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2171)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。召喚出的刺石叢會留在戰場上5秒，阻礙敵方移動。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2171)@</color> Summon 7 rows of thorny rocks from the ground to <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Int(2171)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy. The summoned thorn stones will stay on the battlefield for 5 seconds, blocking the movement of the enemy.
